title: My Dad's Job
description: My dad's job sure sounds like a lot of fun. He's part of a team. He fights off raiders. And sometimes he even gets to ride on a bull. But what if dad's job isn't as much fun as it sounds? There's only one way to be sure....And that's to merge the talents of an enterprising author -- in this case, Peter Glassman -- and an innovative illustrator -- like Timothy Bush -- in a picture book that's guaranteed to give you the best return for the buck and still not break the bank.
